mapper.update:
update RMTOTAL
RMTOTAL_OUT_FISC_TOTAL_NO = #{rmtotalOutFiscTotalNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_OUT_FISC_TOTAL_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_OUT_FISC_TOTAL_AMT = #{rmtotalOutFiscTotalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_OUT_FISC_TOTAL_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_CASH_NO = #{rmtotalFROCashNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_CASH_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_CASH_AMT = #{rmtotalFROCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_CASH_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_C_PAY_NO = #{rmtotalFROCPayNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_C_PAY_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_C_PAY_AMT = #{rmtotalFROCPayAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_C_PAY_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_TRANSF_NO = #{rmtotalFROTransfNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_TRANSF_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_TRANSF_AMT = #{rmtotalFROTransfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_TRANSF_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_T_PAY_NO = #{rmtotalFROTPayNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_T_PAY_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_T_PAY_AMT = #{rmtotalFROTPayAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_T_PAY_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_R_T_PAY_NO_T = #{rmtotalFRORTPayNoT,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_R_T_PAY_NO_T, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_O_R_T_PAY_AMT_T = #{rmtotalFRORTPayAmtT,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_O_R_T_PAY_AMT_T, 0),
RMTOTAL_IN_FISC_TOTAL_NO = #{rmtotalInFiscTotalNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_IN_FISC_TOTAL_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_IN_FISC_TOTAL_AMT = #{rmtotalInFiscTotalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_IN_FISC_TOTAL_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_NO = #{rmtotalFRINo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_AMT = #{rmtotalFRIAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_PAY_NO = #{rmtotalFRIPayNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_PAY_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_PAY_AMT = #{rmtotalFRIPayAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_PAY_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_NO = #{rmtotalFRIRNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_AMT = #{rmtotalFRIRAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_TRANSF_NO = #{rmtotalFRIRTransfNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_TRANSF_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_TRANSF_AMT = #{rmtotalFRIRTransfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_TRANSF_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_S_C_CASH_NO = #{rmtotalSCCashNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_S_C_CASH_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_S_C_CASH_AMT = #{rmtotalSCCashAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_S_C_CASH_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_S_C_TRANSF_NO = #{rmtotalSCTransfNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_S_C_TRANSF_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_S_C_TRANSF_AMT = #{rmtotalSCTransfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_S_C_TRANSF_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_S_C_TRANSF_NO = #{rmtotalFSCTransfNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_S_C_TRANSF_NO, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_S_C_TRANSF_AMT = #{rmtotalFSCTransfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_S_C_TRANSF_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_OUT_YESTERDAY_BAL = #{rmtotalOutYesterdayBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_OUT_YESTERDAY_BAL, 0),
RMTOTAL_IN_YESTERDAY_BAL = #{rmtotalInYesterdayBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_IN_YESTERDAY_BAL, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_PRE_AMT = #{rmtotalFRIRPreAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_PRE_AMT, 0),
RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_PRE_NO = #{rmtotalFRIRPreNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} + NVL(RMTOTAL_F_R_I_R_PRE_NO, 0),
UPDATE_USERID = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE,
where RMTOTAL_DATE = #{rmtotalDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and RMTOTAL_BRNO = #{rmtotalBrno,jdbcType=CHAR}
